TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
The Enderprise wasn't much of a ship guys. It was just a bridge and a few hallways, no ship systems in place yet. 

It was about 15 minutes of work, so its not that big of a deal.

Also, I have a youtube channel too, not many viewers but its there. Me and Starwhip were thinking of recording together. Not sure what's going on now though.
I wanna join! (Note: I can't build crap ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) )

> 
> I wanna join! (Note: I can't build crap ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) )

Its alright most of our workforce is noobs anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) the ideality we have is that once you guys have become pros we will be happy to have you! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Plus if you can fly a spaceship we could bring you along on combat missions and send you on trade and salvage expeditions.

> 
> Is it the one in the screenshots?
> BTW since you have a youtube channel could you do a lets play of starmade within nextech.

That would be quite fun. I'll see what's possible.

Yep, it's the one in the screenshots. I was testing it on a shop fleet near the server spawn when I had to leave, so you won't find it. (Probably. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)) I was having some lag issues but finally landed a hit with the main missile array and one-shotted the Salvager Corvette. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Strangely enough, it seems the antimissile turrets were not responding, but it may have been that the AI was disabled. :I

wouldnt it be cool if rather than the shields directly hugging the vessel it will be surrounding the ship in a ellipsoidal shape meaning that on large ships there will be room for a small fighter to fly between the ship and the shields and blow the guts out of the big ship! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (AKA it makes it possible for any ship to win against another if the pilot has the right stuff.)

I ran a combat test, *Kalzoria Star* against a pirate-controlled version of itself. (AI was on easy... dunno what the server's AI is set to) The fight dragged on for at least twenty minutes, until I figured out how to take my own ship out: Go for the turrets. I targeted one of them so my own turrets would concentrate fire and gave the enemy ship the works. A few seconds later, it's shields dropped below 50% and it all fell to pieces. One of my turrets landed a hit, and at least six of the enemy's turrets fell off. Thus weakening the defenses. More missiles hit, more turrets fell off. Soon it had none left. I stopped chasing the ship and waited for my rockets to get a lock, and fired everything at once. That finished the battle. All it managed to do to me was knock off a few of my turrets. (Again, it was on easy)

Someone named Sliquui wants to join should i let him?
